maya/beastmayaplugin/src/customnodes.cpp
/*

#include "customnodes.h"

#include "mayanodes/nodeenums.h"
#include "mayanodes/nodeids.h"
#include "mayanodes/beastentitynode.h"
#include "mayanodes/beastinstancenode.h"
#include "mayanodes/beasttargetnode.h"
#include "mayanodes/beastsettingsnode.h"
#include "mayanodes/beastpassnode.h"
#include "mayanodes/beastoslshader.h"
#include "mayautils.h"

#define MNoVersionString

#include <maya/MNodeClass.h>
#include <maya/MFnPlugin.h>
#include <maya/MDGModifier.h>
#include <maya/MGlobal.h>

namespace beastmaya {

CustomNodes::CustomNodes(const MObject& plugin) : m_plugin(plugin) {
        registerNodes();

        MStatus res;
        m_ids.push_back(MSceneMessage::addCallback(MSceneMessage::kAfterOpen, createDefaultNodes, this, &res));
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        m_ids.push_back(MSceneMessage::addCallback(MSceneMessage::kAfterNew, createDefaultNodes, this, &res));
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        m_ids.push_back(MSceneMessage::addCallback(MSceneMessage::kBeforeOpen, disableAutoCreateNodes, this, &res));
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);

        createDefaultNodes(this);
}

CustomNodes::~CustomNodes() {
        for(auto i = begin(m_ids); i != end(m_ids); ++i) {
                MMessage::removeCallback(*i);
        }

        deregisterNodes();
}

void CustomNodes::registerNodes() {
        MStatus res;
        MFnPlugin plugin(m_plugin);

        const MString classSurface("shader/surface");

        res = plugin.registerNode("beastSettings", BeastSettingsNode::id, BeastSettingsNode::creator, (MInitializeFunction)BeastSettingsNode::initialize);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        res = plugin.registerNode("beastTarget", BeastTargetNode::id, BeastTargetNode::creator, (MInitializeFunction)BeastTargetNode::initialize, MPxNode::kObjectSet);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        res = plugin.registerNode("beastEntity", BeastEntityNode::id, BeastEntityNode::creator, (MInitializeFunction)BeastEntityNode::initialize);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        res = plugin.registerNode("beastPass", BeastPassNode::id, BeastPassNode::creator, (MInitializeFunction)BeastPassNode::initialize);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        res = plugin.registerNode("beastInstance", BeastInstanceNode::id, BeastInstanceNode::creator, (MInitializeFunction)BeastInstanceNode::initialize);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        res = plugin.registerNode("beastOSLShader", BeastOSLShader::id, BeastOSLShader::creator, (MInitializeFunction)BeastOSLShader::initialize, MPxNode::kDependNode, &classSurface);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
}

void CustomNodes::deregisterNodes() {
        MStatus res;
        MFnPlugin plugin(m_plugin);
        res = plugin.deregisterNode(BeastSettingsNode::id);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        res = plugin.deregisterNode(BeastTargetNode::id);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        res = plugin.deregisterNode(BeastEntityNode::id);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        res = plugin.deregisterNode(BeastPassNode::id);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        res = plugin.deregisterNode(BeastInstanceNode::id);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        res = plugin.deregisterNode(BeastOSLShader::id);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
}

void CustomNodes::createDefaultNodes(void* clientData) {
        MStatus res;
        MDGModifier dgm;

        if (findMayaNode(L"persp") == MObject::kNullObj) {
                // If there's no persp then there's probably no scene at all.. so don't create any default nodes because it will go crazy.
                // Set a flag for objects to not auto-create node instances
                res = MGlobal::executeCommand(L"global int $gBeastAutoCreateNodes=0;");
                CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
                return;
        }

        // Set a flag for objects to auto-create node instances
        res = MGlobal::executeCommand(L"global int $gBeastAutoCreateNodes=1;");
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);

        // Find out if nodes already exist and delete them if they're not valid
        MObject settings = findMayaNode(L"beastSettings");
        MFnDependencyNode settingsNode(settings, &res);
        if (res == MStatus::kSuccess && settingsNode.typeId() != BeastSettingsNode::id) {
                dgm.setNodeLockState(settings, false);
                CHECK_MSTATUS(dgm.doIt());
                dgm.deleteNode(settings);
                CHECK_MSTATUS(dgm.doIt());
                settings = MObject::kNullObj;
        }

        MObject pass = findMayaNode(L"defaultBeastPass");
        MFnDependencyNode passNode(pass, &res);
        if (res == MStatus::kSuccess && passNode.typeId() != BeastPassNode::id) {
                dgm.setNodeLockState(pass, false);
                CHECK_MSTATUS(dgm.doIt());
                dgm.deleteNode(pass);
                CHECK_MSTATUS(dgm.doIt());
                pass = MObject::kNullObj;
        }

        MObject textureTarget = findMayaNode(L"defaultBeastTextureTarget");
        MFnDependencyNode textureTargetNode(textureTarget, &res);
        if (res == MStatus::kSuccess && textureTargetNode.typeId() != BeastTargetNode::id) {
                dgm.setNodeLockState(textureTarget, false);
                CHECK_MSTATUS(dgm.doIt());
                dgm.deleteNode(textureTarget);
                CHECK_MSTATUS(dgm.doIt());
                textureTarget = MObject::kNullObj;
        }

        MObject vertexTarget = findMayaNode(L"defaultBeastVertexTarget");
        MFnDependencyNode vertexTargetNode(vertexTarget, &res);
        if (res == MStatus::kSuccess && vertexTargetNode.typeId() != BeastTargetNode::id) {
                dgm.setNodeLockState(vertexTarget, false);
                CHECK_MSTATUS(dgm.doIt());
                dgm.deleteNode(vertexTarget);
                CHECK_MSTATUS(dgm.doIt());
                vertexTarget = MObject::kNullObj;
        }

        // Create new nodes if we don't have any
        if (settings == MObject::kNullObj) {
                settings = dgm.createNode(BeastSettingsNode::id, &res);
                if (res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        dgm.renameNode(settings, "beastSettings");
                        dgm.setNodeLockState(settings, true);
                }
        }

        bool passNodeCreated = false;
        if (pass == MObject::kNullObj) {
                pass = dgm.createNode(BeastPassNode::id, &res);
                if (res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        dgm.renameNode(pass, "defaultBeastPass");
                        dgm.setNodeLockState(pass, true);
                        passNodeCreated = true;
                }
        }

        bool textureTargetNodeCreated = false;
        if (textureTarget == MObject::kNullObj) {
                textureTarget = dgm.createNode(BeastTargetNode::id, &res);
                if (res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        dgm.renameNode(textureTarget, "defaultBeastTextureTarget");
                        dgm.setNodeLockState(textureTarget, true);
                        textureTargetNodeCreated = true;
                }
        }

        bool vertexTargetNodeCreated = false;
        if (vertexTarget == MObject::kNullObj) {
                vertexTarget = dgm.createNode(BeastTargetNode::id, &res);
                if (res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        dgm.renameNode(vertexTarget, "defaultBeastVertexTarget");
                        setPlugValue(vertexTarget, L"targetType", TARGET_TYPE_VERTEXBAKE);
                        dgm.setNodeLockState(vertexTarget, true);
                        vertexTargetNodeCreated = true;
                }
        }

        res = dgm.doIt();
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);

        // Create default connections
        if (passNodeCreated || textureTargetNodeCreated) {
                res = connect(pass, L"targets", textureTarget, L"passes");
                CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        }

        if (passNodeCreated || vertexTargetNodeCreated) {
                res = connect(pass, L"targets", vertexTarget, L"passes");
                CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        }
}

void CustomNodes::disableAutoCreateNodes( void* clientData ) {
        MStatus res = MGlobal::executeCommand(L"global int $gBeastAutoCreateNodes=0;");
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
}

}
